name: Personalized Beauty Discovery Inc.
description: Operator of an online beauty platform intended to inspire individuals and offer beauty ideas. The company's platform contains articles, videos blogs, and retail personalized products through their monthly membership subscription, enabling users to get tools to define their own definition of beauty and feel confident.
